https://tmrev.io/movie/155491-Alex Pandian 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/pi5nekESuNU7wAf28IeOUyvj1ms.jpg Alex Pandian (Tamil: அலெக்ஸ் பாண்டியன்) is a Tamil action-masala film directed by Suraj that features Karthi and Anushka Shetty in the lead roles, while Santhanam plays a pivotal supporting role. Devi Sri Prasad composed the music. The film will also be dubbed and simultaneously released in Telugu as Bad Boy. Alex Pandian
